remarks: The uniformity of an extension of ` RR ` is the uniformity generated by its distance.  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 2-May-2018.)
statement:
rrextust.b $e |- B = ( Base ` R ) $.
rrextust.d $e |- D = ( ( dist ` R ) |` ( B X. B ) ) $.
rrextust $p |- ( R e. RRExt -> ( UnifSt ` R ) = ( metUnif ` D ) ) $.
